# The `XCoreMCInstLower` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class is used to lower an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> into an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This class is used to lower an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> into an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcinst">MCInst</a>.
